text: "Kiss You" is a 2013 song by English-Irish boy band One Direction and is the third and final single from their second studio album Take Me Home (2012). It was also released as the record's second single in Germany. It went to number 7 in Ireland and Scotland, number 9 in the United Kingdom, number 13 in Mexico and New Zealand, number 16 in South Korea, number 18 in Japan, number 24 in Denmark, number 30 in Belgium, Canada and the Netherlands, number 36 in France, number 45 in Switzerland and number 46 in the United States. == Track listing == * CD single # "Kiss You" – 3:04 # "Little Things" – 3:42 == References == Category:2013 songs Category:One Direction songs
title: Kiss You (One Direction song)
